data.title: Theatergeschichten: Gretchen und die Meerkatze; Ein Kapitel aus dem Grunen Heinrich von Gottfried Keller mit 7 Farbholzschnitten von Felix Hoffmann - with Christmas Cards to Margaret McElderry!

data.text: Aarau, Switzerland: Aargauische Buchdruckerfachschule, 1969. Edition of 1500, Quarto, decorated boards, 24 pp, 7 full page color woodcuts by Hoffmann. Very good in lightly used paper-covered slipcase. With six inscribed cards (various dimensions, all with illustrations) to his US editor Margaret McElderry, two unsigned ones as well, all with pinholes attesting to McElderry's putting them up. McElderry, a legendary editor of children's books who was given her own imprint, solicited Hoffmann to illustrate many books, and Hoffmann was clearly one of her favorite illustrators. Nice association copy! McElderry, born in Pittsburgh in 1912, died in 2011. Very Good. Item #H9310
